api_list.name: Zappos product detail by Product ID
api_list.description: Get realtime product information by product_id from Zappos

api_list.name: Zappos search product

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: `best_seller , relevance, low_to_high, high_to_low, customer_rating, new_arrivals, brand_name`

api_list.name: Category List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zappos-realtime-data.p.rapidapi.com/category.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zappos-realtime-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zappos-realtime-data.p.rapidapi.com/category.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zappos-realtime-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
